long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The enhanced Shopee Reviews Extractor is a powerful tool for e-commerce professionals to gather and analyze product review data without coding skills. Extract comprehensive review information and receive AI-generated summaries to make data-driven decisions.

Key Features:
- One-click review extraction
- Customizable data export (CSV, JSON, XLSX)
- AI Review Summary powered by ChatGPT
- User-friendly interface
- Local data processing for privacy

AI Review Summary provides:
- Product advantages
- Product disadvantages
- Improvement suggestions
- "To Buy or Not to Buy" recommendation

How to Use:
1. Navigate to any Shopee.com product page
2. Click the "Download Reviews" button below the product title
3. Choose your export format in the popup window
4. (Optional) Click "AI Review Summary" for detailed analysis

Perfect for:
- E-commerce professionals
- Market researchers
- Product managers
- Business owners

Unlock customer insights and drive growth with the Enhanced Shopee Reviews Extractor!

Data Privacy:
All data processing occurs locally on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.

Disclaimer:
ExtensionsBox independently develops this extension and is not associated with Shopee Inc.
